solution_line_template: Yes RSVP responses are {total_guests} x {yes_percent_num}% = <<{total_guests}*{yes_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={yes_rsvp}>>{yes_rsvp} guests.
No RSVP responses are {total_guests} x {no_percent_num}% = <<{total_guests}*{no_percent_num}*{percent_factor}={no_rsvp}>>{no_rsvp} guests.
Guests who did not respond at all are {total_guests} - {responded_guests} = <<{total_guests}-{responded_guests}={non_responded_guests}>>{non_responded_guests}.
